author: beaton
msg: Better test coverage for OAuth token storage, and allow the OAuth tests
to run without relying on particular files in the classpath.  This lets
us run the tests independently from inside eclipse.

author: oching
msg: -show the project's homepage url in the project group summary

author: beaton
msg: We're throwing "class not found" exceptions on startup for apache
commons io classes.  For reasons that I don't understand, conflicting
commons-io dependencies between htmlunit (1.3.1) and shindig (1.4) cause
maven to decide not to include either version in our generate war files.
Regardless of how weird the symptom, excluding the conflicting
dependency seems like a reasonable fix for the root cause.
